object.name: SuccessFactors - NonAuthoritative
object.description: Non-authoritative connection - used for "Standard" employees as well as "Hybrid" and "Dual Role" employees.

attributes.name: User.Email
attributes.description: Email address of the user. Some variance from PRIMARYEMAILADDRESS attribute.

attributes.name: SecondaryUsername
attributes.description: Dual Role secondary AD account sAMAccountName - /person/employment_information/custom_string35

attributes.name: SecondaryEmailAddress
attributes.description: Dual Role secondary AD UPN or Email - /person/employment_information/custom_string36

attributes.name: EmpEmployment.startDate
attributes.description: OData reference for Best Start Date for a Job

attributes.name: Termination Date
attributes.description: It populates Termination Date for Employees and WorkOrder End Date for Contingent Workers

attributes.name: UserType
attributes.description: The primary class of user as assigned from SF to support distinct sourcing and handling.

attributes.name: EmpJob.customString59
attributes.description: Try to get the User Type for the exact EmpJob

attributes.name: Company
attributes.description: The company under which employee belongs.

attributes.name: Division
attributes.description: Represent Division name in the organization data

attributes.name: JobTitle
attributes.description: Represent Job Title Associated with Employee

attributes.name: PositionNumber
attributes.description: Represent Position Number associated with Employee

attributes.name: CostCenterID
attributes.description: Cost centre ID associated with employee

attributes.name: CostCenter
attributes.description: Represent Cost center associated with employee

attributes.name: IsContingentWorker
attributes.description: Represent whether Employee is Contingent Worker or Not

attributes.name: IsFullTime
attributes.description: Represent whether Employee is Full Time or Part Time

attributes.name: EmpJob.customString69
attributes.description: DealerCode - via a translatable value (SF option id)

attributes.name: AdvisorID
attributes.description:
Advisor Code under Fundserv Dealer code. Unique across both IG dealers in practice.
/person/employment_information/custom_string33
(was /person/custom_string1)

attributes.name: EmpEmployment.customString33
attributes.description:
Advisor Code under Fundserv Dealer code. Unique across both IG dealers in practice.
/person/employment_information/custom_string33
(was /person/custom_string1)

attributes.name: FirstName_Legal
attributes.description: From the SF "display_name" attribute, which should in fact be the legal first name value.  (contrasted against SF "first_name" which is the PREFERRED first name for sailpoint and downstream usage.)

attributes.name: JobInfoLastModified
attributes.description: Date when Job Information was Last Modified

attributes.name: FutureActions
attributes.description: Information about Future Actions in JSON format

attributes.name: LastModifiedDate
attributes.description: Date on which last modification on group is done

attributes.name: IsStaticGroup
attributes.description: Group is of type static or dynamic

attributes.name: Roles
attributes.description: Roles associated to the access group

attributes.name: Groups
attributes.description: Access groups associated to the role

connectorAttributes.aggregationFilter: businessUnit eq "41100000" and company ne "3010" and (customString54 eq null or customString54 ne "7913")
